body:
Did you just install xcode8?

Edit cmd/dist and remove the -Werror flag wherever you find it. That'll get
you unblocked.

I've heard that there will be a 1.4.4 to fix the Sierra crash issue, but
there is no ETA so I'd apply this workaround.

On Thu, 22 Sep 2016, 05:41 Byron Grogan <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Please answer these questions before submitting your issue. Thanks!
> What version of Go are you using (go version)?
>
> x
> What operating system and processor architecture are you using (go env)?
>
> $ uname -a
> Darwin Byrons-MacBook-Pro-3.local 15.4.0 Darwin Kernel Version 15.4.0: Fri
> Feb 26 22:08:05 PST 2016; root:xnu-3248.40.184~3/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64
>
> $ sysctl -n machdep.cpu.brand_string
> Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-5287U CPU @ 2.90GHz
>
> $ sw_vers
> ProductName: Mac OS X
> ProductVersion: 10.11.4
> BuildVersion: 15E65
>
> GOARCH="amd64"
> GOHOSTARCH="amd64"
> GOHOSTOS="darwin"
> GOOS="darwin"
> GOROOT="/usr/local/Cellar/go/1.7.1/libexec"
> GOTOOLDIR="/usr/local/Cellar/go/1.7.1/libexec/pkg/tool/darwin_amd64"
> CC="clang"
> GOGCCFLAGS="-fPIC -m64 -pthread -fno-caret-diagnostics -Qunused-arguments -fmessage-length=0 -fdebug-prefix-map=/var/folders/ml/2nr7wt652n9ddq8yhtxfjzw40000gp/T/go-build066728938=/tmp/go-build -gno-record-gcc-switches -fno-common"
> CXX="clang++"
> CGO_ENABLED="1"
>
> What did you do?
>
> Attempted to build Go 1.4 from source for a certain debugger tool.
> Following Installing Go from source
> <https://golang.org/doc/install/source> guide.
> $ git clone https://go.googlesource.com/go
> $ cd go
> $ git checkout go1.4
> $ cd src
> $ ./all.bash
> What did you expect to see?
>
> A successful build.
> What did you see instead?
>
> # Building C bootstrap tool.
> cmd/dist
>
> # Building compilers and Go bootstrap tool for host, darwin/amd64.
> lib9
> libbio
> liblink
> cmd/cc
> cmd/gc
> cmd/6l
> cmd/6a
> cmd/6c
> /Users/byrongrogan/git/go/src/cmd/6c/txt.c:995:28: error: shifting a negative signed value is undefined [-Werror,-Wshift-negative-value]
> /Users/byrongrogan/git/go/src/cmd/6c/txt.c:1045:28: error: shifting a negative signed value is undefined [-Werror,-Wshift-negative-value]
> go tool dist: FAILED: clang -Wall -Wstrict-prototypes -Wextra -Wunused -Wno-sign-compare -Wno-missing-braces -Wno-parentheses -Wno-unknown-pragmas -Wno-switch -Wno-comment -Wno-missing-field-initializers -Werror -fno-common -ggdb -pipe -Wuninitialized -O2 -fno-caret-diagnostics -Qunused-arguments -fmessage-length=0 -mmacosx-version-min=10.6 -c -m64 -I /Users/byrongrogan/git/go/include -I /Users/byrongrogan/git/go/src/cmd/6c -o /Users/byrongrogan/git/go/pkg/obj/cmd/6c/txt.o /Users/byrongrogan/git/go/src/cmd/6c/txt.c
>
> â€”
